Name: endur
Author: Harvey Barnhard
Subtitle: Personalized Endurance Reports
Description: Python scripts to pull and clean Strava data for creating personalized reports for endurance activities.

Name: looperr
Author: Harvey Barnhard
Subtitle: Fast Grouped Regressions and Evaluating Prediction Error
Description: An R package for quickly running many regressions by group. Additional functionality includes quickly running local linear regressions and evaluating prediction error.

Name: smoov
Author: Harvey Barnhard
Subtitle: Making Mapping Easier
Description: An R package for making mapping of basic United States geographies, such as census tracts, fast and easy.
